post: The Debate & Leadership Institute, hosted by Founding Forward and the Bill of Rights Institute, brings rising 10th-12th graders to Valley Forge for 5 days of debate training, civic learning, and historic site visits in Philadelphia. Know a student who would thrive in this setting? Share this with them. 🔗  https://lnkd.in/erA2KXha  #DebateAndLeadershipInstitute  #CivicEducation  #YouthLeadership  #PublicSpeaking  #CollegeReady

As the year ends, its a perfect moment for students to reflect on their impact. Big or small, those actions can become a MyImpact Challenge submission. What student-led service stood out this year? Details:  https://lnkd.in/gagj58zD  #MyImpactChallenge  #CivicLeadership  #YouthDevelopment  #ServiceLearning

From regional Bees to the national championship, students will face BRI-designed civics questions and experiences at every level of the 2026 National Civics Bee Students competing for recognition and prizes, including a $100,000 education savings plan contribution for the national champion. Which students in your network should know about this? 🔗 How it works:  https://lnkd.in/esNd4QDK  #NationalCivicsBee  #CivicEducation  #YouthLeadership  #StudentAchievement

No need to change your unit. Civic Star fits what youre already teaching. Add one short A250 tie-in, log it in minutes, and your class enters Decembers drawings. Whats your simplest civics connection this week? 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #TeachingResources  #CivicEducation  #America250  #K12Teachers

A wonderful morning with BRI's President David Bobb at the Civic Star Challenge Breakfast at  #NCSS2025. Thank you to all the teachers who joined us to celebrate civic learning and Americas 250th. I absolutely love them! The kids use them every day, highlighting & looking information up.   Lili V., New York educator $1 = 1 Pocket Constitution for a student in your state, right when theyre learning about their rights and responsibilities. The 2026 National Civics Bee begins with a written essay: students identify a local challenge, propose a solution, and connect it to founding principles and civic virtues. BRI helped shape the essay prompt and supporting materials so teachers and students have clear, rigorous guidance. 🔗 Details:  https://lnkd.in/esNd4QDK  #NationalCivicsBee  #CivicEducation  #WritingSkills  #StudentVoice

Day 1 at  #NCSS2025! Visit us at booths 408, 410, and 412 to explore classroom-ready civics lessons, games, and Americas 250th resources. Join our network for free materials:  https://bit.ly/4oqRng4  #CivicEducation  #TeachingHistory  #K12

As winter break approaches, one small civic activity can keep classroom momentum going. Log 1 A250-aligned lesson or discussion and your class is entered for Decembers Civic Star prizes. How are you building civic learning this month? 🔗  https://bit.ly/3V1CQuX  #CivicStarChallenge  #CivicEducation  #StudentEngagement  #K12  #TeachingResources

Were all set for  #NCSS2025! From unboxing to booth setup, our team is ready to meet educators and share resources that support impactful civics instruction. Stay connected + access free materials:  https://bit.ly/4oqRng4  #CivicEducation  #SocialStudies  #TeachingResources
